title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru. Shin
original_name: やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている。新
sinopse:
Oregairu Shin is a sweet, bitter and annoying youth rom-com that's slightly different than what came before! This shows the new school year, new semester, and the new third year students who have begun to develop their new relationships!

(Translated by Fish_Food from Watari Wataru's tweet)
